ValidationRule.description: Prevents saving projects (created on/after 2/16/2025) with stage 'Deliverables Complete', group 'Business Value Strategy', and engagement type 'BVS Engagement' if no related closeout record exists
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2025, 2, 16), ISPICKVAL(pse__Stage__c, "BVS Deliverables Complete"), pse__Group__r.Name = "Business Value Strategy", ISPICKVAL(Engagement_Type__c, "BVS Engagement"), BVS_Project_Closeout__c = 0 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete the closeout survey process before proceeding. These questions are listed on the right side of your screen titled PSA BVS Closeout Survey Screen Flow
